title: ambhOjamAbha
sahitya:
ambhOjanAbha mAm pAlaya satatam ambhOjAlayAjAnE


anupallavi

  jambhavairi vandita jalaja lOla lOcana kumbha sambhava vinuta kuntIsuta sArathE


caraNam 1    bhujanga shayana hari krSNa bhujanga vairiratha gOpi 
bhujanga bhAma sangaranga bhujangavara kAliyadamana 
bhujanga lOka vAsinuta bhujanga varada dEva dEva 
bhujanga bhUSaNa sannuta lIla bhujanga rUpa sankarSaNa
    caraNam 2    lOla lOla vanamAla nIla surabhilavAla 
lAlasita nija jAla pAlitasura vairi jAla 
bAla sUrya sama cEla bAlagOpa dhrtashaila 
pAlita gO gOpAla jAla jita shishupAla
